oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Thompson Show 1948-04-29 Disc #3 & 4
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Multiple recordings of the Hank Thompson Radio Show. Original recording date is April 29, 1948. Thompson is backed by his Brazos Valley Boys. Recordings are labeled as Disc #3 and Disc #4 respectfully.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Thompson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) I Got A Letter from My Kid Today (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (01:55) Tennessee Waltz (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (04:08) Froggie Went A'Courtin (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (05:56) Farther Along (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (08:49) Miss Mollie (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (10:04) Second Hand Gal (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (11:37) Blue Eyes Crying in the Rain (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (13:45) Blue Prairie (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (16:14) Cowboy Jack (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (19:21) Those Tears in Your Eyes (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (21:30) I Know My Baby Loves Me (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (23:13) The Great Judgement Morning (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (25:42) Don't Live a Lie (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Thompson, Hank;
